6751 return NO_GROUP;
6752 }
6753
6754 // Part 1: Detect file formatting details
6755 struct gsc_GenotypeFile_MatrixFormat format_detected =
6756 { .has_header = GSC_NA, .markers_as_rows = GSC_NA, .cell_style = GSC_GENOTYPECELLSTYLE_UNKNOWN };
6757 if (format.filetype == GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_MATRIX) {
6758 format_detected = format.spec.matrix;
6759 }
6760 size_t queuesize = 0;
6761
6762 gsc_TableFileReader tbl = gsc_tablefilereader_create(filename);
6763 // Read one row + 2 cells (if possible)
6764 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(cellsread,gsc_TableFileCell,100);
6765 size_t ncellsread = 0;
6766 do {
6767 cellsread[ncellsread] = gsc_tablefilereader_get_next_cell(&tbl);
6768 gsc_tablefilecell_deep_copy(&cellsread[ncellsread]);
6769 ++ncellsread;
6770 if (ncellsread >= cellsreadcap) {
6771 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(cellsread,2*ncellsread);
6772 }
6773 } while (!cellsread[ncellsread-1].eof && (ncellsread <= 1 || !cellsread[ncellsread-1].predNewline));
6774 size_t ncellsfirstrow = (cellsread[ncellsread-1].eof && cellsread[ncellsread-1].cell_len > 0) ? ncellsread : ncellsread - 1;
6775 if (!cellsread[ncellsread-1].eof) { // read one more cell if possible
6776 cellsread[ncellsread] = gsc_tablefilereader_get_next_cell(&tbl);
6777 gsc_tablefilecell_deep_copy(&cellsread[ncellsread]);
6778 ++ncellsread;
6779 if (ncellsread >= cellsreadcap) {
6780 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(cellsread,2*ncellsread);
6781 }
6782 }
6783 queuesize = ncellsread; // so that we know how many to free if we failure_exit
6784 if (ncellsread <= 1) { // file is an EOF only
6785 goto failure_exit;
6786 }
6787 //int is_onecol_file = cellsread[ncellsfirstrow + 1].predNewline > 0 || ncellsread == 2; // ncellsread == 2 means we read one cell, then an EOF
6788 int is_onerow_file = ncellsread == ncellsfirstrow || cellsread[ncellsfirstrow].eof; // short-circuiting essential!
6789
6790 format_detected = gsc_helper_genotypefile_matrix_detect_orientation(d, cellsread, ncellsfirstrow, ncellsread, format_detected, filename);
6791 format_detected = gsc_helper_genotypefile_matrix_detect_cellstyle(cellsread, ncellsfirstrow, ncellsread, format_detected, filename);
6792 format_detected = gsc_helper_genotypefile_matrix_detect_header(cellsread, ncellsfirstrow, ncellsread, format_detected, filename);
6793 if ((format_detected.has_header != GSC_FALSE && format_detected.has_header != GSC_TRUE) ||
6794 (format_detected.markers_as_rows != GSC_FALSE && format_detected.markers_as_rows != GSC_TRUE) ||
6795 format_detected.cell_style == GSC_GENOTYPECELLSTYLE_UNKNOWN) {
6796 goto failure_exit;
6797 }
6798
6799 GSC_LOGICVAL format_has_corner_cell = GSC_NA;
6800 // If markers as columns, we do need to know how many cells are in the second row in order to detect a corner cell
6801 if (!format_detected.markers_as_rows && !is_onerow_file) {
6802 // Read rest of second row
6803 while (!cellsread[ncellsread-1].eof && !cellsread[ncellsread-1].predNewline) {
6804 cellsread[ncellsread] = gsc_tablefilereader_get_next_cell(&tbl);
6805 gsc_tablefilecell_deep_copy(&cellsread[ncellsread]);
6806 ++ncellsread;
6807 if (ncellsread >= cellsreadcap) {
6808 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(cellsread,2*ncellsread);
6809 }
6810 }
6811 // Detect corner cell
6812 queuesize = ncellsread; // so that we know how many to free if we failure_exit
6813 size_t ncellssecondrow = ncellsread - ncellsfirstrow - 1;
6814 format_has_corner_cell = gsc_helper_genotypefile_matrix_detect_cornercell_presence(ncellsfirstrow, ncellssecondrow, cellsread[ncellsfirstrow].predCol > 0);
6815 if (format_has_corner_cell == GSC_NA) {
6816 fprintf(stderr, "(Loading %s) Failure: Header row length and second row length do not align\n", filename);
6817 goto failure_exit;
6818 }
6819 }
6820
6821 // Create the queue of cells to parse (exclude header from this queue, because it needs to be dealt with differently)
6822 gsc_TableFileCell* cellqueue = cellsread;
6823 //queuesize = ncellsread; (already done above)
6824 if (format_detected.has_header) {
6825 cellqueue = cellsread + ncellsfirstrow;
6826 queuesize = ncellsread - ncellsfirstrow;
6827 }
6828
6829 // PART 2: Create uniform-spaced map, if we have no map currently
6830 _Bool build_map_from_rows = 0;
6831 if (d->genome.n_markers == 0) {
6832 if (format_detected.markers_as_rows) {
6833 build_map_from_rows = 1;
6834 // We're going to have to do an independent read of the file to extract these. Will be a bit slower.
6835 gsc_TableFileReader tbl2 = gsc_tablefilereader_create(filename);
6836 gsc_TableFileCell cell = gsc_tablefilereader_get_next_cell(&tbl2);
6837 GSC_GENOLEN_T nmarkersread = format_detected.has_header ? 0 : 1;
6838 do {
6839 cell = gsc_tablefilereader_get_next_cell(&tbl2);
6840 if (cell.predNewline) { ++nmarkersread; }
6841 } while (!cell.eof);
6842 gsc_tablefilereader_close(&tbl2);
6843 if (cell.predNewline) { // there's a newline before eof, so no real actual last row
6844 --nmarkersread;
6845 }
6846
6847 d->genome.n_markers = nmarkersread;
6848 d->genome.marker_names = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*d->genome.marker_names)*d->genome.n_markers, GSC_TRUE);
6849 d->genome.names_alphabetical = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*d->genome.names_alphabetical)*d->genome.n_markers, GSC_TRUE);
6850 gsc_create_uniformspaced_recombmap(d,0,NULL,d->genome.n_markers);
6851
6852 } else { // markers as columns
6853 if (!format_detected.has_header) { // you should not be able to get here. // assert(format_detected.has_header == GSC_TRUE);
6854 fprintf(stderr, "(Loading %s) Failure: Genotype matrix with markers as columns but no header row is an unsupported file type (there is no way to tell which column is which marker)\n", filename);
6855 goto failure_exit;
6856 }
6857
6858 size_t i = format_has_corner_cell ? 1 : 0; // starting index for iterating through names
6859 d->genome.n_markers = ncellsfirstrow - i;
6860 d->genome.marker_names = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*d->genome.marker_names)*d->genome.n_markers, GSC_TRUE);
6861 d->genome.names_alphabetical = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*d->genome.names_alphabetical)*d->genome.n_markers, GSC_TRUE);
6862 for (size_t j = 0; j < d->genome.n_markers; ++i, ++j) {
6863 //gsc_tablefilecell_deep_copy(&cellqueue[i]); // already deep copied
6864 d->genome.marker_names[j] = cellsread[i].cell;
6865 cellsread[i].isCellShallow = GSC_TRUE; // prevent deletion
6866 d->genome.names_alphabetical[j] = &d->genome.marker_names[j];
6867 }
6868 qsort(d->genome.names_alphabetical,d->genome.n_markers,sizeof(*d->genome.names_alphabetical),gsc_helper_indirect_alphabetical_str_comparer);
6869 gsc_create_uniformspaced_recombmap(d,0,NULL,d->genome.n_markers); // create based on the markers we've saved in 'genome'
6870 }
6871 }
6872
6873 // PART 3: Parse file into an AlleleMatrix
6874
6875 gsc_GroupNum group = gsc_get_new_group_num(d);
6876 struct gsc_EmptyListNavigator it = gsc_create_emptylistnavigator(d, group);
6877 GSC_GENOLEN_T nvalidmarker = 0;
6878 size_t n_cols = 0;
6879 if (format_detected.markers_as_rows) {
6880
6881 gsc_GenoLocation loc;
6882 gsc_TableFileCell ncell;
6883 n_cols = (format_detected.has_header) ? ncellsfirstrow + 1 : ncellsfirstrow; // assume first row has no corner cell for now
6884 _Bool first = 1;
6885 _Bool have_valid_marker = 0; GSC_GENOLEN_T markerix;
6886 GSC_GLOBALX_T column = 0;
6887 size_t row = 0;
6888 do {
6889 ncell = gsc_helper_tablefilereader_get_next_cell_wqueue(&tbl,&cellqueue,&queuesize);
6890
6891 if (ncell.cell != NULL) {
6892 if (ncell.predNewline || first) {
6893 char tmp = ncell.cell[ncell.cell_len]; ncell.cell[ncell.cell_len] = '\0';
6894
6895 if (build_map_from_rows) {
6896 have_valid_marker = 1;
6897 if (first) {
6898 markerix = 0;
6899 } else {
6900 markerix++;
6901 }
6902 gsc_tablefilecell_deep_copy(&ncell);
6903 d->genome.marker_names[markerix] = ncell.cell;
6904 ncell.isCellShallow = GSC_TRUE; // prevent deletion
6905 } else {
6906 have_valid_marker = gsc_get_index_of_genetic_marker(ncell.cell, d->genome, &markerix);
6907 }
6908
6909 nvalidmarker += have_valid_marker;
6910 ncell.cell[ncell.cell_len] = tmp;
6911 // Then, after reading first row, detect what our expected row length is, if defaults don't suit.
6912 if (row == 1 && format_detected.has_header) {
6913 if (column + 1 != ncellsfirstrow && column + 1 != ncellsfirstrow + 1) {
6914 fprintf(stderr, "(Loading %s) Failure: Header row length and second row length do not align\n", filename);
6915 goto failure_exit;
6916 } else {
6917 n_cols = column + 1;
6918 }
6919 }
6920 first = 0;
6921 column = 0;
6922 ++row;
6923
6924 } else if (ncell.predCol) { // any number of column spacers treated as one column gap when reading a genotype matrix
6925 ++column;
6926 if (have_valid_marker && column < n_cols) {
6927 loc = (1 == column) ? gsc_emptylistnavigator_get_first(&it) : gsc_emptylistnavigator_get_next(&it);
6928 gsc_helper_genotypecell_to_allelematrix(loc,markerix,format_detected.cell_style,ncell.cell,d);
6929 } // Note we ignore all extra cells in all rows
6930 }
6931 }
6932
6933 if (!ncell.isCellShallow) { GSC_FREE(ncell.cell); }
6934 } while (!ncell.eof);
6935 if (row == 1 && format_detected.has_header) {
6936 if (column + 1 != ncellsfirstrow && column + 1 != ncellsfirstrow + 1) {
6937 fprintf(stderr, "(Loading %s) Failure: Header row length and second row length do not align\n", filename);
6938 goto failure_exit;
6939 } else {
6940 n_cols = column + 1;
6941 }
6942 }
6943
6944 // Then save the genotype names
6945 if (format_detected.has_header) {
6946 format_has_corner_cell = gsc_helper_genotypefile_matrix_detect_cornercell_presence(ncellsfirstrow, n_cols, cellsread[ncellsfirstrow].predCol > 0);
6947 size_t i = format_has_corner_cell ? 1 : 0;
6948 gsc_GenoLocation loc;
6949 for (size_t j = 0; i < ncellsfirstrow; ++i, ++j) {
6950 loc = (j == 0) ? gsc_emptylistnavigator_get_first(&it) : gsc_emptylistnavigator_get_next(&it);
6951 // assert(!cellsread[i].isShallowCopy);
6952 gsc_set_name(loc,cellsread[i].cell); // using names here so no need to free them. Since they're in cellsread
6953 cellsread[i].isCellShallow = GSC_TRUE; // prevent deletion
6954 }
6955 }
6956
6957 // Then finalise the map, if we're creating one:
6958 if (build_map_from_rows) {
6959 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T i = 0; i < d->genome.n_markers; ++i) {
6960 d->genome.names_alphabetical[i] = &d->genome.marker_names[i];
6961 }
6962 qsort(d->genome.names_alphabetical,d->genome.n_markers,sizeof(*d->genome.names_alphabetical),gsc_helper_indirect_alphabetical_str_comparer);
6963 }
6964
6965 } else { // markers as columns
6966 if (!format_detected.has_header) { // you should not be able to get here.
6967 fprintf(stderr, "(Loading %s) Failure: Genotype matrix with markers as columns but no header row is an unsupported file type (there is no way to tell which column is which marker)\n", filename);
6968 goto failure_exit;
6969 }
6970
6971 // Identify the marker corresponding to each column
6972 size_t i = format_has_corner_cell ? 1 : 0;
6973 size_t n_col = ncellsfirstrow + (1-i);
6974 GSC_GENOLEN_T* markerixs = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*markerixs)*ncellsfirstrow,GSC_TRUE);
6975 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T j = 0; i < ncellsfirstrow; ++i, ++j) {
6976 markerixs[j] = d->genome.n_markers;
6977 nvalidmarker += gsc_get_index_of_genetic_marker(cellsread[i].cell, d->genome, &markerixs[j]);
6978 }
6979
6980 // Read the table
6981 _Bool first = 1;
6982 GSC_GLOBALX_T row = 0;
6983 size_t column = 0; // we count column numbers from 1 for the first body cell. sorry for the inconsistency with the branch of the if statement above.
6984 gsc_GenoLocation loc = gsc_emptylistnavigator_get_first(&it);
6985 gsc_TableFileCell ncell;
6986 do {
6987 ncell = gsc_helper_tablefilereader_get_next_cell_wqueue(&tbl,&cellqueue,&queuesize);
6988
6989 if (ncell.cell != NULL) {
6990 if (ncell.predNewline) {
6991 loc = (first) ? gsc_emptylistnavigator_get_first(&it) : gsc_emptylistnavigator_get_next(&it);
6992 first = 0;
6993
6994 ++row;
6995 column = 0;
6996 if (ncell.predCol) { // missing name.
6997 gsc_set_name(loc,NULL);
6998 } else {
6999 gsc_tablefilecell_deep_copy(&ncell);
7000 gsc_set_name(loc,ncell.cell);
7001 ncell.isCellShallow = GSC_TRUE; // so it does not get deleted
7002 }
7003 }
7004
7005 if (ncell.predCol) {
7006 ++column;
7007 if (column < n_col && markerixs[column-1] < d->genome.n_markers) {
7008 gsc_helper_genotypecell_to_allelematrix(loc,markerixs[column-1],format_detected.cell_style,ncell.cell,d);
7009 }
7010 }
7011 }
7012
7013 if (!ncell.isCellShallow) { GSC_FREE(ncell.cell); }
7014 } while (!ncell.eof);
7015
7016 GSC_FREE(markerixs);
7017
7018 }
7019
7020 // PART 4: Tidy and clean and exit
7021 GSC_GLOBALX_T ngenos = 0;
7022 AlleleMatrix* tmpam = it.firstAM;
7023 do {
7024 ngenos += tmpam->n_genotypes;
7025 } while ((tmpam = tmpam->next) != NULL);
7026 printf("(Loading %s) %lu genotype(s) of %lu marker(s) were loaded.\n", filename,
7027 (long unsigned int) ngenos, (long unsigned int) nvalidmarker);
7028 if (ngenos == 0) {
7029 gsc_delete_allele_matrix(it.firstAM);
7030 goto failure_exit;
7031 }
7032 gsc_emptylistnavigator_finaliselist(&it);
7033 ++d->n_groups;
7034
7035 // ... cleaning up the header row
7036 if (format_detected.has_header) {
7037 for (size_t j = 0; j < ncellsfirstrow; ++j) {
7038 if (!cellsread[j].isCellShallow) { GSC_FREE(cellsread[j].cell); }
7039 }
7040 }
7041 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(cellsread);
7042 gsc_tablefilereader_close(&tbl);
7043 return group;
7044
7045 failure_exit:
7046 // Clean up structures and return, having loaded no genotypes
7047 // ... cleaning up unprocessed cells in the queue
7048 for (size_t i = 1; i <= queuesize; ++i) {
7049 if (!cellsread[ncellsread-i].isCellShallow) {
7050 GSC_FREE(cellsread[ncellsread-i].cell);
7051 cellsread[ncellsread-i].isCellShallow = GSC_TRUE;
7052 }
7053 }
7054 // ... cleaning up the header row
7055 if (format_detected.has_header) {
7056 for (size_t j = 0; j < ncellsfirstrow; ++j) {
7057 if (!cellsread[j].isCellShallow) { GSC_FREE(cellsread[j].cell); }
7058 }
7059 }
7060 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(cellsread);
7061 gsc_tablefilereader_close(&tbl);
7062 return NO_GROUP;
7063}
7064
7082gsc_GroupNum gsc_load_genotypefile(SimData* d,
7083 const char* filename,
7084 const gsc_FileFormatSpec format) {
7085 return gsc_load_data_files(d,filename,NULL,NULL,format).group;
7086}
7087
7106struct gsc_MultiIDSet gsc_load_data_files(gsc_SimData* d,
7107 const char* genotype_file,
7108 const char* map_file,
7109 const char* effect_file,
7110 const gsc_FileFormatSpec format) {
7111 // Parse file suffix for file type, if it was not already provided
7112 enum gsc_GenotypeFileType type = format.filetype;
7113
7114 if (type == GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_UNKNOWN) {
7115 type = GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_MATRIX;
7116 char* suffix = strrchr(genotype_file,'.');
7117 if (suffix != NULL) {
7118 if (strcmp(suffix,".bed") == 0) {
7119 type = GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_BED;
7120 } else if (strcmp(suffix,".ped") == 0) {
7121 type = GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_PED;
7122 } else if (strcmp(suffix,".vcf") == 0) {
7123 type = GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_VCF;
7124 }
7125 }
7126 }
7127
7128 struct gsc_MultiIDSet out = { .group=NO_GROUP, .map=NO_MAP, .effSet=NO_EFFECTSET };
7129
7130 switch (type) {
7131 case GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_BED:
7132 //if (detectedtype) { printf("Will attempt to parse %s as a plink .bed file\n", filename); }
7133 fprintf(stderr,"plink .bed file parsing not yet implemented\n");
7134 break;
7135 case GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_PED:
7136 fprintf(stderr,"plink .ped file parsing not yet implemented\n");
7137 break;
7138 case GSC_GENOTYPEFILE_VCF:
7139 fprintf(stderr,"vcf file parsing not yet implemented\n");
7140 break;
7141 default:
7142 //printf("(Loading files) Will treat %s as a genotype matrix (see genomicSimulation's default input file types)\n", genotype_file);
7143 out.map = gsc_load_mapfile(d, map_file);
7144 out.group = gsc_load_genotypefile_matrix(d, genotype_file, format);
7145 out.effSet = gsc_load_effectfile(d, effect_file);
7146 }
7147
7148 return out;
7149}
7150
7151/*--------------------------Recombination counts-----------------------------*/
7152
7187int* gsc_calculate_min_recombinations_fw1(gsc_SimData* d, gsc_MapID mapid, char* parent1, unsigned int p1num, char* parent2,
7188 unsigned int p2num, char* offspring, int certain) {
7189 if (d->genome.n_maps < 1) {
7190 fprintf(stderr,"Need at least one recombination map loaded to estimate recombinations\n");
7191 return NULL;
7192 }
7193 int mapix = 0;
7194 if (mapid.id != NO_MAP.id) { mapix = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, mapid); }
7195 if (mapix >= d->genome.n_maps) {
7196 fprintf(stderr,"We don't have that recombination maps loaded\n");
7197 return NULL;
7198 }
7199 gsc_RecombinationMap map = d->genome.maps[mapix];
7200
7201 int* origins = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(int) * d->genome.n_markers,GSC_TRUE);
7202 memset(origins,0,sizeof(*origins)*d->genome.n_markers);
7203 int p1match, p2match;
7204 int previous = 0;
7205
7206
7207 for (int chr = 0; chr < map.n_chr; ++chr) {
7208 //RPACKINSERT R_CheckUserInterrupt();
7209
7210 switch (map.chrs[chr].type) {
7211 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_SIMPLE:
7212 for (int i = 0; i < map.chrs[chr].map.simple.n_markers; ++i) {
7213 p1match = gsc_has_same_alleles(parent1, offspring, i);
7214 p2match = gsc_has_same_alleles(parent2, offspring, i);
7215 if (p1match && !p2match) {
7216 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = p1num;
7217 previous = p1num;
7218 } else if (p2match && !p1match) {
7219 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = p2num;
7220 previous = p2num;
7221 } else {
7222 if (certain) {
7223 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = 0;
7224 } else {
7225 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = previous;
7226 }
7227 }
7228 }
7229 break;
7230
7231 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_REORDER:
7232 for (int i = 0; i < map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.n_markers; ++i) {
7233 p1match = gsc_has_same_alleles(parent1, offspring, i);
7234 p2match = gsc_has_same_alleles(parent2, offspring, i);
7235 if (p1match && !p2match) {
7236 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = p1num;
7237 previous = p1num;
7238 } else if (p2match && !p1match) {
7239 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = p2num;
7240 previous = p2num;
7241 } else {
7242 if (certain) {
7243 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = 0;
7244 } else {
7245 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = previous;
7246 }
7247 }
7248 }
7249 break;
7250 }
7251
7252 }
7253 return origins;
7254}
7255
7296int* gsc_calculate_min_recombinations_fwn(gsc_SimData* d, gsc_MapID mapid, char* parent1, unsigned int p1num, char* parent2,
7297 unsigned int p2num, char* offspring, int window_size, int certain) {
7298 if (d->genome.n_maps < 1) {
7299 fprintf(stderr,"Need at least one recombination map loaded to estimate recombinations\n");
7300 return NULL;
7301 }
7302 int mapix = 0;
7303 if (mapid.id != NO_MAP.id) { mapix = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, mapid); }
7304 if (mapix >= d->genome.n_maps) {
7305 fprintf(stderr,"We don't have that recombination maps loaded\n");
7306 return NULL;
7307 }
7308 gsc_RecombinationMap map = d->genome.maps[mapix];
7309
7310
7311 int* origins = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(int) * d->genome.n_markers,GSC_TRUE);
7312 memset(origins,0,sizeof(*origins)*d->genome.n_markers);
7313 int p1match, p2match;
7314 int previous = 0, window_range = (window_size - 1)/2, i;
7315
7316 for (int chr = 0; chr < map.n_chr; ++chr) {
7317 //RPACKINSERT R_CheckUserInterrupt();
7318
7319 switch (map.chrs[chr].type) {
7320 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_SIMPLE:
7321 for (i = 0; i < window_range; ++i) {
7322 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = 0;
7323 }
7324 for (; i < map.chrs[chr].map.simple.n_markers - window_range; ++i) {
7325 p1match = gsc_has_same_alleles_window(parent1, offspring, i, window_size);
7326 p2match = gsc_has_same_alleles_window(parent2, offspring, i, window_size);
7327 if (p1match && !p2match) {
7328 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = p1num;
7329 previous = p1num;
7330 } else if (p2match && !p1match) {
7331 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = p2num;
7332 previous = p2num;
7333 } else {
7334 if (certain) {
7335 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = 0;
7336 } else {
7337 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = previous;
7338 }
7339 }
7340 }
7341 for (; i < map.chrs[chr].map.simple.n_markers; ++i) {
7342 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i] = 0;
7343 }
7344 break;
7345
7346 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_REORDER:
7347 for (i = 0; i < window_range; ++i) {
7348 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = 0;
7349 }
7350 for (; i < map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.n_markers - window_range; ++i) {
7351 p1match = gsc_has_same_alleles_window(parent1, offspring, i, window_size);
7352 p2match = gsc_has_same_alleles_window(parent2, offspring, i, window_size);
7353 if (p1match && !p2match) {
7354 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = p1num;
7355 previous = p1num;
7356 } else if (p2match && !p1match) {
7357 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = p2num;
7358 previous = p2num;
7359 } else {
7360 if (certain) {
7361 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = 0;
7362 } else {
7363 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = previous;
7364 }
7365 }
7366 }
7367 for (; i < map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.n_markers; ++i) {
7368 origins[map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] = 0;
7369 }
7370 break;
7371 }
7372
7373 }
7374 return origins;
7375}
7376
7413int gsc_calculate_recombinations_from_file(gsc_SimData* d, const char* input_file, const char* output_file,
7414 int window_len, int certain) {
7415 struct gsc_TableSize t = gsc_get_file_dimensions(input_file, '\t');
7416 //open file
7417 FILE* fp;
7418 if ((fp = fopen(input_file, "r")) == NULL) {
7419 fprintf(stderr, "Failed to open file %s.\n", input_file); exit(1);
7420 }
7421 FILE* fpo;
7422 if ((fpo = fopen(output_file, "w")) == NULL) {
7423 fprintf(stderr, "Failed to open file %s.\n", output_file); exit(1);
7424 }
7425
7426 // print header.
7427 for (int j = 0; j < d->genome.n_markers; ++j) {
7428 fprintf(fpo, "\t%s", d->genome.marker_names[j]);
7429 }
7430
7431 int combin_i[3];
7432 char* combin_genes[3];
7433 char buffer[3][50];
7434 int* r;
7435 // for each row in file
7436 for (int i = 0; i < t.num_rows; ++i) {
7437 // load the four grandparents
7438 fscanf(fp, "%s %s %s \n", buffer[0], buffer[1], buffer[2]);
7439 combin_i[0] = gsc_get_index_of_name(d->m, buffer[0]);
7440 combin_i[1] = gsc_get_index_of_name(d->m, buffer[1]);
7441 combin_i[2] = gsc_get_index_of_name(d->m, buffer[2]);
7442 if (combin_i[0] < 0 || combin_i[1] < 0 || combin_i[2] < 0) {
7443 fprintf(stderr, "Genotypes at file %s line %lu could not be found\n", input_file, (long unsigned int) i);
7444 continue;
7445 }
7446 combin_genes[0] = gsc_get_genes_of_index(d->m, combin_i[0]);
7447 combin_genes[1] = gsc_get_genes_of_index(d->m, combin_i[1]);
7448 combin_genes[2] = gsc_get_genes_of_index(d->m, combin_i[2]);
7449
7450 if (window_len == 1) {
7451 r = gsc_calculate_min_recombinations_fw1(d, NO_MAP, combin_genes[1],
7452 gsc_get_id_of_index(d->m, combin_i[1]).id, combin_genes[2],
7453 gsc_get_id_of_index(d->m, combin_i[2]).id, combin_genes[0], certain);
7454 } else {
7455 r = gsc_calculate_min_recombinations_fwn(d, NO_MAP, combin_genes[1],
7456 gsc_get_id_of_index(d->m, combin_i[1]).id, combin_genes[2],
7457 gsc_get_id_of_index(d->m, combin_i[2]).id, combin_genes[0], window_len, certain);
7458 }
7459 fprintf(fpo, "\n%s", buffer[0]);
7460 for (int j = 0; j < d->genome.n_markers; ++j) {
7461 fprintf(fpo, "\t%d", r[j]);
7462 }
7463 GSC_FREE(r);
7464 }
7465
7466 fclose(fp);
7467 fwrite("\n", sizeof(char), 1, fpo);
7468 fflush(fpo);
7469 fclose(fpo);
7470 return 0;
7471}
7472
7473
7474/*--------------------------------Crossing-----------------------------------*/
7475
7503void gsc_generate_gamete(gsc_SimData* d,
7504 const char* parent_genome,
7505 char* output,
7506 const GSC_ID_T map_index) {
7507 // assumes rand is already seeded
7508 if (parent_genome == NULL) {
7509 fprintf(stderr, "Could not generate this gamete: no parent provided\n");
7510 return;
7511 }
7512 if (map_index >= d->genome.n_maps) {
7513 fprintf(stderr, "Could not generate this gamete: invalid map provided\n");
7514 return;
7515 }
7516 gsc_RecombinationMap map = d->genome.maps[map_index];
7517
7518 // treat each chromosome separately.
7519 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(crossover_where, double, 100);
7520 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T chr = 0; chr < d->genome.maps[map_index].n_chr; ++chr) {
7521
7522 // Task 1: How many crossovers
7523 int num_crossovers;
7524 switch (map.chrs[chr].type) {
7525 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_SIMPLE:
7526 num_crossovers = gsc_randpoi(&d->rng, map.chrs[chr].map.simple.expected_n_crossovers);
7527 break;
7528 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_REORDER:
7529 num_crossovers = gsc_randpoi(&d->rng, map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.expected_n_crossovers);
7530 break;
7531 default:
7532 fprintf(stderr, "Linkage group type of linkage group with index %lu of map with index %lu is corrupted\n",
7533 (long unsigned int) chr, (long unsigned int) map_index);
7534 num_crossovers = 0;
7535 }
7536
7537 // Task 2: Find positions of all crossovers
7538 if (num_crossovers > crossover_wherecap) {
7539 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(crossover_where,num_crossovers);
7540 }
7541 for (int i = 0; i < num_crossovers; ++i) {
7542 crossover_where[i] = ((double)rand() / (double)RAND_MAX);
7543 }
7544 if (num_crossovers > 1) {
7545 qsort(crossover_where, num_crossovers, sizeof(double), gsc_helper_ascending_double_comparer);
7546 }
7547
7548 // Task 3: Read off the gamete that those crossovers produce.
7549 int which = rnd_pcg_range(&d->rng,0,1); // if this is 0, we start with the left haplotype
7550 int up_to_crossover = 0;
7551 switch (map.chrs[chr].type) {
7552 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_SIMPLE:
7553 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T i = 0; i < map.chrs[chr].map.simple.n_markers; ++i) {
7554 // is it time to invert which parent haplotype we're reading?
7555 while (up_to_crossover < num_crossovers &&
7556 map.chrs[chr].map.simple.dists[i] > crossover_where[up_to_crossover]) {
7557 which = 1 - which;
7558 up_to_crossover++;
7559 }
7560 output[2*(i + map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index)] =
7561 parent_genome[2*(i + map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index) + which];
7562 }
7563 break;
7564 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_REORDER:
7565 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T i = 0; i < map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.n_markers; ++i) {
7566 // is it time to invert which parent haplotype we're reading?
7567 while (up_to_crossover < num_crossovers &&
7568 map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.dists[i] > crossover_where[up_to_crossover]) {
7569 which = 1 - which;
7570 up_to_crossover++;
7571 }
7572 output[2*map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i]] =
7573 parent_genome[2*map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i] + which];
7574 }
7575 break;
7576 default:
7577 break;
7578 }
7579 }
7580 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(crossover_where);
7581}
7582
7602void gsc_generate_doubled_haploid(gsc_SimData* d,
7603 const char* parent_genome,
7604 char* output,
7605 const GSC_ID_T map_index) {
7606 /* For cache reasons it'll be better to copy-paste gsc_generate_gamete with
7607 * one extra line added to the inner loop, than to generate a single gamete
7608 * and then scan over `output` again to copy it. */
7609
7610 // assumes rand is already seeded
7611 if (parent_genome == NULL) {
7612 fprintf(stderr, "Could not make this doubled haploid\n");
7613 return;
7614 }
7615 if (map_index >= d->genome.n_maps) {
7616 fprintf(stderr, "Could not generate this gamete: invalid map provided\n");
7617 return;
7618 }
7619 gsc_RecombinationMap map = d->genome.maps[map_index];
7620
7621 // treat each chromosome separately.
7622 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(crossover_where, double, 100);
7623 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T chr = 0; chr < d->genome.maps[map_index].n_chr; ++chr) {
7624
7625 // Task 1: How many crossovers
7626 int num_crossovers;
7627 switch (map.chrs[chr].type) {
7628 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_SIMPLE:
7629 num_crossovers = gsc_randpoi(&d->rng, map.chrs[chr].map.simple.expected_n_crossovers);
7630 break;
7631 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_REORDER:
7632 num_crossovers = gsc_randpoi(&d->rng, map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.expected_n_crossovers);
7633 break;
7634 default:
7635 fprintf(stderr, "Linkage group type of group with index %lu of map with index %lu is corrupted\n",
7636 (long unsigned int) chr, (long unsigned int) map_index);
7637 num_crossovers = 0;
7638 }
7639
7640 // Task 2: Find positions of all crossovers
7641 if (num_crossovers > crossover_wherecap) {
7642 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(crossover_where,num_crossovers);
7643 }
7644 for (int i = 0; i < num_crossovers; ++i) {
7645 crossover_where[i] = ((double)rand() / (double)RAND_MAX);
7646 }
7647 if (num_crossovers > 1) {
7648 qsort(crossover_where, num_crossovers, sizeof(double), gsc_helper_ascending_double_comparer);
7649 }
7650
7651 // Task 3: Read off the gamete that those crossovers produce.
7652 int which = rnd_pcg_range(&d->rng,0,1); // if this is 0, we start with the left haplotype
7653 int up_to_crossover = 0;
7654 switch (map.chrs[chr].type) {
7655 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_SIMPLE:
7656 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T i = 0; i < map.chrs[chr].map.simple.n_markers; ++i) {
7657 // is it time to invert which parent haplotype we're reading?
7658 while (up_to_crossover < num_crossovers &&
7659 map.chrs[chr].map.simple.dists[i] > crossover_where[up_to_crossover]) {
7660 which = 1 - which;
7661 up_to_crossover++;
7662 }
7663 GSC_GENOLEN_T pos = i + map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index;
7664 output[2*pos] = parent_genome[2*pos + which];
7665 output[2*pos + 1] = output[2*pos]; // haploid doubling happens here
7666 }
7667 break;
7668 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_REORDER:
7669 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T i = 0; i < map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.n_markers; ++i) {
7670 // is it time to invert which parent haplotype we're reading?
7671 while (up_to_crossover < num_crossovers &&
7672 map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.dists[i] > crossover_where[up_to_crossover]) {
7673 which = 1 - which;
7674 up_to_crossover++;
7675 }
7676 GSC_GENOLEN_T pos = map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i];
7677 output[2*pos] = parent_genome[2*pos + which];
7678 output[2*pos + 1] = output[2*pos]; // haploid doubling happens here
7679 }
7680 break;
7681 default:
7682 break;
7683 }
7684 }
7685 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(crossover_where);
7686}
7687
7688
7700void gsc_generate_clone(gsc_SimData* d,
7701 const char* parent_genome,
7702 char* output) {
7703 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T j = 0; j < d->genome.n_markers; ++j) {
7704 output[2*j] = parent_genome[2*j];
7705 output[2*j + 1] = parent_genome[2*j + 1];
7706 }
7707 return;
7708}
7709
7711static FILE* gsc_helper_genoptions_save_pedigrees_setup(const gsc_GenOptions g) {
7712 FILE* fp = NULL;
7713 if (g.will_save_pedigree_to_file) {
7714 char tmpname_p[NAME_LENGTH];
7715 if (g.filename_prefix != NULL) {
7716 strncpy(tmpname_p, g.filename_prefix,
7717 sizeof(char)*(NAME_LENGTH-13));
7718 } else {
7719 strcpy(tmpname_p, "out");
7720 }
7721 strcat(tmpname_p, "-pedigree.txt");
7722 fp = fopen(tmpname_p, "w");
7723 }
7724 return fp;
7725}
7731static FILE* gsc_helper_genoptions_save_bvs_setup(const gsc_SimData* d,
7732 const gsc_GenOptions g,
7733 GSC_ID_T* effIndexp) {
7734 FILE* fe = NULL;
7735 if (g.will_save_bvs_to_file.id != GSC_NO_EFFECTSET.id) {
7736 *effIndexp = gsc_get_index_of_eff_set(d,g.will_save_bvs_to_file);
7737 if (*effIndexp != GSC_NA_IDX) {
7738 char tmpname_b[NAME_LENGTH];
7739 if (g.filename_prefix != NULL) {
7740 strncpy(tmpname_b, g.filename_prefix,
7741 sizeof(char)*(NAME_LENGTH-7));
7742 } else {
7743 strcpy(tmpname_b, "out");
7744 }
7745 strcat(tmpname_b, "-bv.txt");
7746 fe = fopen(tmpname_b, "w");
7747 }
7748 }
7749 return fe;
7750}
7752static FILE* gsc_helper_genoptions_save_genotypes_setup(const gsc_SimData* d,
7753 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
7754 FILE* fg = NULL;
7755 if (g.will_save_alleles_to_file) {
7756 char tmpname_g[NAME_LENGTH];
7757 if (g.filename_prefix != NULL) {
7758 strncpy(tmpname_g, g.filename_prefix,
7759 sizeof(char)*(NAME_LENGTH-13));
7760 } else {
7761 strcpy(tmpname_g, "out");
7762 }
7763 strcat(tmpname_g, "-genotype.txt");
7764 fg = fopen(tmpname_g, "w");
7765 // Save genetic markers as header row.
7766 gsc_save_utility_genotypes(fg, NULL, d->genome.n_markers, d->genome.marker_names, GSC_FALSE);
7767 }
7768 return fg;
7769}
7770
7776static void gsc_helper_genoptions_save_pedigrees(FILE* fp,
7777 gsc_SimData* d,
7778 gsc_AlleleMatrix* tosave) {
7779 if (fp) {
7780 gsc_BidirectionalIterator it = gsc_create_bidirectional_iter_fromAM(tosave, NO_GROUP);
7781 gsc_save_utility_pedigrees(fp, &it, GSC_TRUE, d->m);
7782 gsc_delete_bidirectional_iter(&it);
7783 }
7784}
7791static void gsc_helper_genoptions_save_bvs(FILE* fe,
7792 gsc_EffectMatrix* effMatrices,
7793 GSC_ID_T effIndex,
7794 gsc_AlleleMatrix* tosave) {
7795 if (fe && effIndex != GSC_NA_IDX) {
7796 gsc_BidirectionalIterator it = gsc_create_bidirectional_iter_fromAM(tosave, NO_GROUP);
7797 gsc_save_utility_bvs(fe, &it, effMatrices + effIndex);
7798 gsc_delete_bidirectional_iter(&it);
7799 }
7800}
7806static void gsc_helper_genoptions_save_genotypes(FILE* fg, gsc_AlleleMatrix* tosave) {
7807 if (fg) {
7808 gsc_BidirectionalIterator it = gsc_create_bidirectional_iter_fromAM(tosave, NO_GROUP);
7809 gsc_save_utility_genotypes(fg, &it, tosave->n_markers, NULL, GSC_FALSE);
7810 gsc_delete_bidirectional_iter(&it);
7811 }
7812}
7813
7817static void gsc_helper_genoptions_give_names_and_ids(gsc_AlleleMatrix* am,
7818 gsc_SimData* d,
7819 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
7820 if (g.will_name_offspring) {
7821 gsc_set_names(am, g.offspring_name_prefix, d->current_id.id, 0);
7822 }
7823 if (g.will_allocate_ids) {
7824 for (GSC_LOCALX_T j = 0; j < am->n_genotypes; ++j) {
7825 ++(d->current_id.id);
7826 am->ids[j] = d->current_id;
7827 }
7828 }
7829}
7830
7831
7832union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes {
7833 struct {
7834 GSC_GLOBALX_T n_crosses;
7835 GSC_GLOBALX_T group_size;
7836 GSC_ID_T map_index;
7837 GSC_GLOBALX_T cap;
7838 GSC_GLOBALX_T* uses;
7839 } rand;
7840 struct {
7841 GSC_GLOBALX_T n_crosses;
7842 GSC_GLOBALX_T group1_size;
7843 GSC_GLOBALX_T group2_size;
7844 GSC_ID_T map1_index;
7845 GSC_ID_T map2_index;
7846 GSC_GLOBALX_T cap1;
7847 GSC_GLOBALX_T cap2;
7848 GSC_GLOBALX_T* uses1;
7849 GSC_GLOBALX_T* uses2;
7850 } rand_btwn;
7851 struct {
7852 GSC_GLOBALX_T n_crosses;
7853 GSC_ID_T map1_index;
7854 GSC_ID_T map2_index;
7855 GSC_GLOBALX_T* first_parents;
7856 GSC_GLOBALX_T* second_parents;
7857 } targeted;
7858 struct {
7859 GSC_ID_T map_index;
7860 unsigned int n_gens_selfing;
7861 } selfing;
7862 struct {
7863 GSC_ID_T map_index; // needs to be in first spot to match selfing.map_index
7864 } doub_haps;
7865 struct {
7866 _Bool inherit_names;
7867 char* parent_name;
7868 } clones;
7869};
7870
7871
7906gsc_GroupNum gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes(gsc_SimData* d,
7907 const gsc_GenOptions g,
7908 void* parentIterator,
7909 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
7910 int (*parentChooser)(void*,
7911 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes*,
7912 GSC_GLOBALX_T*,
7913 gsc_ParentChoice[static 2]),
7914 void (*offspringGenerator)(gsc_SimData*,
7915 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes*,
7916 gsc_ParentChoice[static 2],
7917 gsc_GenoLocation)
7918 ) {
7919 if (g.family_size < 1 || d == NULL ||
7920 parentChooser == NULL || offspringGenerator == NULL) {
7921 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
7922 }
7923
7924 // create the buffer we'll use to save the output crosses before they're printed.
7925 gsc_AlleleMatrix* offspring = gsc_create_empty_allelematrix(d->genome.n_markers, d->n_labels, d->label_defaults, CONTIG_WIDTH);
7926 GSC_LOCALX_T fullness = 0;
7927 GSC_GLOBALX_T counter = 0;
7928 gsc_ParentChoice parents[2] = { { GSC_INVALID_GENO_LOCATION, GSC_NA },
7929 { GSC_INVALID_GENO_LOCATION, GSC_NA } };
7930
7931 gsc_AlleleMatrix* last = NULL;
7932 gsc_GroupNum output_group = GSC_NO_GROUP;
7933 if (g.will_save_to_simdata) {
7934 last = d->m; // for saving to simdata
7935 while (last->next != NULL) {
7936 last = last->next;
7937 }
7938 output_group = gsc_get_new_group_num( d );
7939 }
7940
7941 // open the output files, if applicable
7942 FILE* fp = gsc_helper_genoptions_save_pedigrees_setup(g);
7943 GSC_ID_T effIndex = GSC_NA_IDX;
7944 FILE* fe = gsc_helper_genoptions_save_bvs_setup(d,g,&effIndex);
7945 FILE* fg = gsc_helper_genoptions_save_genotypes_setup(d,g);
7946
7947 //RPACKINSERT GetRNGstate();
7948 // loop through each combination
7949 while (parentChooser(parentIterator, datastore, &counter, parents)) {
7950 ++counter;
7951 for (GSC_GLOBALX_T f = 0; f < g.family_size; ++f, ++fullness) {
7952 //RPACKINSERT R_CheckUserInterrupt();
7953
7954 // when offspring buffer is full, save these outcomes to the file.
7955 if (fullness >= CONTIG_WIDTH) {
7956 offspring->n_genotypes = CONTIG_WIDTH;
7957 gsc_helper_genoptions_give_names_and_ids(offspring, d, g);
7958 gsc_helper_genoptions_save_pedigrees(fp, d, offspring);
7959 gsc_helper_genoptions_save_bvs(fe, d->e, effIndex, offspring);
7960 gsc_helper_genoptions_save_genotypes(fg, offspring);
7961
7962 if (g.will_save_to_simdata) {
7963 last->next = offspring;
7964 last = last->next;
7965 offspring = gsc_create_empty_allelematrix(d->genome.n_markers, d->n_labels, d->label_defaults, CONTIG_WIDTH);
7966 }
7967 fullness = 0; //reset the count and start refilling the matrix
7968 }
7969
7970 // do the cross.
7971 gsc_GenoLocation offspringPos = { .localAM=offspring, .localPos=fullness };
7972 offspringGenerator(d, datastore, parents, offspringPos);
7973 offspring->groups[fullness] = output_group;
7974 if (g.will_track_pedigree) {
7975 offspring->pedigrees[0][fullness] = gsc_get_id(parents[0].loc);
7976 offspring->pedigrees[1][fullness] = gsc_get_id(parents[1].loc);
7977 }
7978 }
7979 }
7980 //RPACKINSERT PutRNGstate();
7981
7982 offspring->n_genotypes = fullness;
7983 gsc_helper_genoptions_give_names_and_ids(offspring, d, g);
7984 gsc_helper_genoptions_save_pedigrees(fp, d, offspring);
7985 gsc_helper_genoptions_save_bvs(fe, d->e, effIndex, offspring);
7986 gsc_helper_genoptions_save_genotypes(fg, offspring);
7987
7988 if (fp) fclose(fp);
7989 if (fe) fclose(fe);
7990 if (fg) fclose(fg);
7991
7992 if (counter > 0 && g.will_save_to_simdata) {
7993 last->next = offspring;
7994 d->n_groups++;
7995 gsc_condense_allele_matrix( d );
7996 return output_group;
7997 } else {
7998 gsc_delete_allele_matrix( offspring );
7999 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8000 }
8001}
8002
8012static int gsc_helper_parentchooser_cross_randomly(void* parentIterator,
8013 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8014 GSC_GLOBALX_T* counter,
8015 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2]) {
8016 gsc_RandomAccessIterator* it = (gsc_RandomAccessIterator*) parentIterator;
8017
8018 GSC_GLOBALX_T parentixs[2] = { 0 };
8019
8020 if (*counter < datastore->rand.n_crosses &&
8021 (datastore->rand.cap == 0 || (*counter) < datastore->rand.cap * datastore->rand.group_size)) {
8022 // get parents, randomly. Must not be identical or already been used too many times.
8023 parentixs[0] = gsc_randomdraw_replacementrules(it[0].d,
8024 datastore->rand.group_size,
8025 datastore->rand.cap,
8026 datastore->rand.uses,
8027 GSC_NA_GLOBALX);
8028 parentixs[1] = gsc_randomdraw_replacementrules(it[0].d,
8029 datastore->rand.group_size,
8030 datastore->rand.cap,
8031 datastore->rand.uses,
8032 parentixs[0]);
8033
8034 if (datastore->rand.cap > 0) {
8035 datastore->rand.uses[parentixs[0]] += 1;
8036 datastore->rand.uses[parentixs[1]] += 1;
8037 }
8038
8039 // Neither of these should fail, if nparents is good.
8040 parents[0].loc = gsc_next_get_nth(parentIterator, parentixs[0]);
8041 parents[1].loc = gsc_next_get_nth(parentIterator, parentixs[1]);
8042 // Reiterate map. Might save us a read to not bother checking their values first.
8043 parents[0].mapindex = datastore->rand.map_index;
8044 parents[1].mapindex = datastore->rand.map_index;
8045 // This will cut short gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes execution if either parent is invalid.
8046 return GSC_IS_VALID_LOCATION(parents[0].loc) && GSC_IS_VALID_LOCATION(parents[1].loc);
8047 } else {
8048 return GSC_FALSE;
8049 }
8050}
8051
8064static void gsc_helper_make_offspring_cross(gsc_SimData* d,
8065 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8066 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2],
8067 gsc_GenoLocation putHere) {
8068 // (silly name)
8069 gsc_generate_gamete(d, gsc_get_alleles(parents[0].loc), (gsc_get_alleles(putHere) ), parents[0].mapindex);
8070 gsc_generate_gamete(d, gsc_get_alleles(parents[1].loc), (gsc_get_alleles(putHere)+1), parents[1].mapindex);
8071}
8072
8078static GSC_GLOBALX_T gsc_helper_random_cross_checks(gsc_SimData* d,
8079 const gsc_GroupNum from_group,
8080 const GSC_GLOBALX_T n_crosses,
8081 const GSC_GLOBALX_T cap) {
8082 GSC_GLOBALX_T g_size = gsc_get_group_size(d, from_group); // might be a better way to do this using the iterator.
8083 if (g_size == 0) {
8084 fprintf(stderr,"Group %lu does not exist\n", (long unsigned int) from_group.num);
8085 return 0;
8086 }
8087
8088 if (n_crosses < 1) {
8089 fprintf(stderr,"Invalid n_crosses value provided: n_crosses must be greater than 0\n");
8090 return 0;
8091 }
8092
8093 if (cap < 0) {
8094 fprintf(stderr,"Invalid cap value provided: cap can't be negative\n");
8095 return 0;
8096 }
8097 if (cap > 0 && cap*g_size < n_crosses) {
8098 fprintf(stderr,"Invalid cap value provided: cap of %lu uses on %lu parents too small to make %lu crosses\n",
8099 (long unsigned int) cap, (long unsigned int) g_size, (long unsigned int) n_crosses);
8100 return 0;
8101 }
8102
8103 return g_size;
8104}
8105
8131gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_random_crosses(gsc_SimData* d,
8132 const gsc_GroupNum from_group,
8133 const GSC_GLOBALX_T n_crosses,
8134 const GSC_GLOBALX_T cap,
8135 const gsc_MapID which_map,
8136 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8137 GSC_GLOBALX_T g_size = gsc_helper_random_cross_checks(d, from_group, n_crosses*2, cap);
8138 if (g_size == 0) {
8139 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8140 } else if (g_size == 1) {
8141 fprintf(stderr,"Group %lu must contain multiple individuals to be able to perform random crossing\n",
8142 (long unsigned int) from_group.num);
8143 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8144 }
8145 if (d->genome.n_maps < 1) {
8146 fprintf(stderr,"Crossing requires at least one recombination map loaded\n");
8147 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8148 }
8149
8150 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes paramstore = { 0 };
8151 paramstore.rand.n_crosses = n_crosses;
8152 paramstore.rand.group_size = g_size;
8153 paramstore.rand.map_index = 0;
8154 paramstore.rand.cap = cap;
8155 if (cap > 0) {
8156 paramstore.rand.uses = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*paramstore.rand.uses)*g_size,GSC_TRUE);
8157 memset(paramstore.rand.uses, 0, sizeof(*paramstore.rand.uses)*g_size);
8158 } else {
8159 paramstore.rand.uses = NULL;
8160 }
8161
8162 if (which_map.id != NO_MAP.id) {
8163 paramstore.rand.map_index = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, which_map);
8164 }
8165 if (paramstore.rand.map_index == GSC_NA_IDX) {
8166 fprintf(stderr,"Could not find recombination map with identifier %lu\n", (long unsigned int) which_map.id);
8167 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8168 }
8169
8170 RandomAccessIterator parentit = gsc_create_randomaccess_iter( d, from_group);
8171
8172 gsc_GroupNum offspring = gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes(d, g, (void*) &parentit,
8173 &paramstore,
8174 gsc_helper_parentchooser_cross_randomly,
8175 gsc_helper_make_offspring_cross );
8176
8177 gsc_delete_randomaccess_iter(&parentit);
8178 GSC_FREE(paramstore.rand.uses);
8179 return offspring;
8180}
8181
8204GSC_GLOBALX_T gsc_randomdraw_replacementrules(gsc_SimData* d,
8205 GSC_GLOBALX_T max,
8206 GSC_GLOBALX_T cap,
8207 GSC_GLOBALX_T* member_uses,
8208 GSC_GLOBALX_T noCollision) {
8209 if (max < 1 || (max == 1 && noCollision == 0)) {
8210 return GSC_NA_GLOBALX;
8211 }
8212 if (max > INT_MAX) {
8213 fprintf(stderr, "Drawing a random number with a max of %lu is not supported on the C version"
8214 "with the rnd library. If the max is greater than %d, probabilistic uniformity may be lost"
8215 "or an infinite loop may occur.", (long unsigned int) max, INT_MAX);
8216 }
8217
8218 GSC_GLOBALX_T parentix = 0;
8219 if (cap > 0) { // n uses of each parent is capped at a number cap.
8220 do {
8221 parentix = rnd_pcg_range(&d->rng,0,max - 1);
8222 } while (parentix == noCollision || member_uses[parentix] >= cap);
8223 } else { // no cap on usage of each parent.
8224 do {
8225 parentix = rnd_pcg_range(&d->rng,0,max - 1);
8226 } while (parentix == noCollision);
8227 }
8228 return parentix;
8229}
8230
8242static int gsc_helper_parentchooser_cross_randomly_between(void* parentIterator,
8243 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8244 GSC_GLOBALX_T* counter,
8245 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2]) {
8246 // caller function should guarantee that nparents is not 1. How would you make a nonselfed cross then?
8247 gsc_RandomAccessIterator* it = (gsc_RandomAccessIterator*) parentIterator;
8248 size_t parentixs[2] = { 0 };
8249
8250 if (*counter < datastore->rand_btwn.n_crosses &&
8251 (datastore->rand_btwn.cap1 == 0 || (*counter) < datastore->rand_btwn.cap1 * datastore->rand_btwn.group1_size) &&
8252 (datastore->rand_btwn.cap2 == 0 || (*counter) < datastore->rand_btwn.cap2 * datastore->rand_btwn.group2_size)) {
8253 // get parents, randomly. Must not be identical or already been used too many times.
8254 parentixs[0] = gsc_randomdraw_replacementrules(it[0].d,
8255 datastore->rand_btwn.group1_size,
8256 datastore->rand_btwn.cap1,
8257 datastore->rand_btwn.uses1,
8258 GSC_NA_GLOBALX);
8259 parentixs[1] = gsc_randomdraw_replacementrules(it[1].d,
8260 datastore->rand_btwn.group2_size,
8261 datastore->rand_btwn.cap2,
8262 datastore->rand_btwn.uses2,
8263 GSC_NA_GLOBALX);
8264
8265 if (datastore->rand_btwn.cap1 > 0) {
8266 datastore->rand_btwn.uses1[parentixs[0]] += 1;
8267 }
8268 if (datastore->rand_btwn.cap2 > 0) {
8269 datastore->rand_btwn.uses2[parentixs[1]] += 1;
8270 }
8271
8272 parents[0].loc = gsc_next_get_nth(it+0, parentixs[0]);
8273 parents[1].loc = gsc_next_get_nth(it+1, parentixs[1]);
8274 parents[0].mapindex = datastore->rand_btwn.map1_index;
8275 parents[1].mapindex = datastore->rand_btwn.map2_index;
8276 return GSC_IS_VALID_LOCATION(parents[0].loc) && GSC_IS_VALID_LOCATION(parents[1].loc);
8277 }
8278 return GSC_FALSE;
8279}
8280
8317gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_random_crosses_between(gsc_SimData*d,
8318 const gsc_GroupNum group1,
8319 const gsc_GroupNum group2,
8320 const GSC_GLOBALX_T n_crosses,
8321 const GSC_GLOBALX_T cap1,
8322 const GSC_GLOBALX_T cap2,
8323 const gsc_MapID map1,
8324 const gsc_MapID map2,
8325 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8326 GSC_GLOBALX_T group1_size = gsc_helper_random_cross_checks(d, group1, n_crosses, cap1);
8327 GSC_GLOBALX_T group2_size = gsc_helper_random_cross_checks(d, group2, n_crosses, cap2);
8328 if (group1_size == 0 || group2_size == 0) {
8329 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8330 }
8331 if (d->genome.n_maps < 1) {
8332 fprintf(stderr,"Crossing requires at least one recombination map loaded\n");
8333 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8334 }
8335
8336 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes paramstore;
8337 paramstore.rand_btwn.n_crosses = n_crosses;
8338 paramstore.rand_btwn.group1_size = group1_size;
8339 paramstore.rand_btwn.group2_size = group2_size;
8340 paramstore.rand_btwn.map1_index = 0;
8341 paramstore.rand_btwn.map2_index = 0;
8342 paramstore.rand_btwn.cap1 = cap1;
8343 paramstore.rand_btwn.cap2 = cap2;
8344 if (cap1 > 0) {
8345 paramstore.rand_btwn.uses1 =
8346 gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*paramstore.rand_btwn.uses1)*group1_size,GSC_TRUE);
8347 memset(paramstore.rand_btwn.uses1, 0, sizeof(*paramstore.rand_btwn.uses1)*group1_size);
8348 } else {
8349 paramstore.rand_btwn.uses1 = NULL;
8350 }
8351 if (cap2 > 0) {
8352 paramstore.rand_btwn.uses2 =
8353 gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*paramstore.rand_btwn.uses2)*group2_size,GSC_TRUE);
8354 memset(paramstore.rand_btwn.uses2, 0, sizeof(*paramstore.rand_btwn.uses2)*group2_size);
8355 } else {
8356 paramstore.rand_btwn.uses2 = NULL;
8357 }
8358
8359 if (map1.id != NO_MAP.id) {
8360 paramstore.rand_btwn.map1_index = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, map1);
8361 }
8362 if (paramstore.rand_btwn.map1_index == GSC_NA_IDX) {
8363 fprintf(stderr,"Could not find recombination map with identifier %lu\n", (long unsigned int) map1.id);
8364 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8365 }
8366 if (map2.id != NO_MAP.id) {
8367 paramstore.rand_btwn.map2_index = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, map2);
8368 }
8369 if (paramstore.rand_btwn.map2_index == GSC_NA_IDX) {
8370 fprintf(stderr,"Could not find recombination map with identifier %lu\n", (long unsigned int) map2.id);
8371 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8372 }
8373
8374 gsc_RandomAccessIterator parentit[2] = { gsc_create_randomaccess_iter( d, group1 ),
8375 gsc_create_randomaccess_iter( d, group2 ) };
8376
8377 gsc_GroupNum offspring = gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes(d, g, (void*) parentit,
8378 &paramstore,
8379 gsc_helper_parentchooser_cross_randomly_between,
8380 gsc_helper_make_offspring_cross );
8381
8382 gsc_delete_randomaccess_iter(&parentit[0]);
8383 gsc_delete_randomaccess_iter(&parentit[1]);
8384 GSC_FREE(paramstore.rand_btwn.uses1);
8385 GSC_FREE(paramstore.rand_btwn.uses2);
8386 return offspring;
8387
8388}
8389
8399static int gsc_helper_parentchooser_cross_targeted(void* parentIterator,
8400 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8401 GSC_GLOBALX_T* counter,
8402 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2]) {
8403 gsc_RandomAccessIterator* it = (gsc_RandomAccessIterator*) parentIterator;
8404 if (*counter >= datastore->targeted.n_crosses) {
8405 return GSC_FALSE;
8406 }
8407
8408 if (datastore->targeted.first_parents[*counter] == GSC_NA_GLOBALX ||
8409 datastore->targeted.second_parents[*counter] == GSC_NA_GLOBALX) {
8410 // because gsc_next_get_nth expects a size_t but our crossing plan is passed as integers.
8411 fprintf(stderr, "Parent chooser found invalid indexes in crossing plan");
8412 return GSC_FALSE;
8413 }
8414 parents[0].loc = gsc_next_get_nth(it, datastore->targeted.first_parents[*counter]);
8415 parents[1].loc = gsc_next_get_nth(it, datastore->targeted.second_parents[*counter]);
8416 parents[0].mapindex = datastore->targeted.map1_index;
8417 parents[1].mapindex = datastore->targeted.map2_index;
8418
8419 // This will cut short gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes execution if either parent is invalid.
8420 return GSC_IS_VALID_LOCATION(parents[0].loc) && GSC_IS_VALID_LOCATION(parents[1].loc);
8421}
8422
8455gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_targeted_crosses(gsc_SimData* d,
8456 const size_t n_combinations,
8457 const GSC_GLOBALX_T* firstParents,
8458 const GSC_GLOBALX_T* secondParents,
8459 const gsc_MapID map1,
8460 const gsc_MapID map2,
8461 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8462 if (n_combinations < 1) {
8463 fprintf(stderr,"Invalid n_combinations value provided: n_combinations must be greater than 0\n");
8464 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8465 }
8466 if (d->genome.n_maps < 1) {
8467 fprintf(stderr,"Crossing requires at least one recombination map loaded\n");
8468 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8469 }
8470
8471 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes paramstore;
8472 paramstore.targeted.n_crosses = n_combinations;
8473 paramstore.targeted.map1_index = 0;
8474 paramstore.targeted.map2_index = 0;
8475 // casting away const but is being used as readonly
8476 paramstore.targeted.first_parents = (GSC_GLOBALX_T*) firstParents;
8477 paramstore.targeted.second_parents = (GSC_GLOBALX_T*) secondParents;
8478
8479 if (map1.id != NO_MAP.id) {
8480 paramstore.targeted.map1_index = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, map1);
8481 }
8482 if (paramstore.targeted.map1_index == GSC_NA_IDX) {
8483 fprintf(stderr,"Could not find recombination map with identifier %lu\n", (long unsigned int) map1.id);
8484 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8485 }
8486 if (map2.id != NO_MAP.id) {
8487 paramstore.targeted.map2_index = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, map2);
8488 }
8489 if (paramstore.targeted.map2_index == GSC_NA_IDX) {
8490 fprintf(stderr,"Could not find recombination map with identifier %lu\n", (long unsigned int) map2.id);
8491 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8492 }
8493
8494 gsc_RandomAccessIterator parentit = gsc_create_randomaccess_iter( d, GSC_NO_GROUP );
8495
8496 gsc_GroupNum offspring = gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes(d, g, (void*) &parentit,
8497 &paramstore,
8498 gsc_helper_parentchooser_cross_targeted,
8499 gsc_helper_make_offspring_cross );
8500
8501 gsc_delete_randomaccess_iter(&parentit);
8502 return offspring;
8503}
8504
8514static int gsc_helper_parentchooser_selfing(void* parentIterator,
8515 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8516 GSC_GLOBALX_T* counter,
8517 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2]) {
8518 gsc_BidirectionalIterator* it = (gsc_BidirectionalIterator*) parentIterator;
8519
8520 parents[0].loc = gsc_next_forwards(it);
8521 parents[0].mapindex = datastore->selfing.map_index;
8522 parents[1] = parents[0];
8523
8524 return GSC_IS_VALID_LOCATION(parents[0].loc);
8525}
8526
8538static void gsc_helper_make_offspring_self_n_times(gsc_SimData* d,
8539 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8540 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2],
8541 gsc_GenoLocation putHere) {
8542 unsigned int n = datastore->selfing.n_gens_selfing;
8543
8544 // error checking parents are the same is not done.
8545 // error checking n >= 1 is not done.
8546
8547 char* tmpparent = gsc_get_alleles(parents[0].loc);
8548 GSC_ID_T map = parents[0].mapindex;
8549 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(tmpchild,char,d->genome.n_markers<<1);
8550 char* output = gsc_get_alleles(putHere);
8551 int n_oddness = n % 2;
8552 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
8553 if (i % 2 == n_oddness) {
8554 gsc_generate_gamete(d, tmpparent, tmpchild, map);
8555 gsc_generate_gamete(d, tmpparent, tmpchild+1, map);
8556 tmpparent = tmpchild;
8557 } else {
8558 gsc_generate_gamete(d, tmpparent, output, map);
8559 gsc_generate_gamete(d, tmpparent, output+1, map);
8560 tmpparent = output;
8561 }
8562 }
8563 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(tmpchild);
8564}
8565
8589gsc_GroupNum gsc_self_n_times(gsc_SimData* d,
8590 const unsigned int n,
8591 const gsc_GroupNum group,
8592 const gsc_MapID which_map,
8593 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8594 /*int group_size = gsc_get_group_size( d, group);
8595 if (group_size < 1) {
8596 fprintf(stderr,"Group %d does not exist.\n", group.num);
8597 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8598 }*/
8599 if (n < 1) {
8600 fprintf(stderr,"Invalid n value provided: Number of generations must be greater than 0\n");
8601 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8602 }
8603 if (d->genome.n_maps == 0) {
8604 fprintf(stderr,"Selfing requires at least one recombination map loaded\n");
8605 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8606 }
8607
8608 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes paramstore;
8609 paramstore.selfing.map_index = 0;
8610 paramstore.selfing.n_gens_selfing = n;
8611
8612 if (which_map.id != NO_MAP.id) {
8613 paramstore.selfing.map_index = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, which_map);
8614 }
8615 if (paramstore.selfing.map_index == GSC_NA_IDX) {
8616 fprintf(stderr,"Could not find recombination map with identifier %lu\n", (long unsigned int) which_map.id);
8617 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8618 }
8619
8620 gsc_BidirectionalIterator parentit = gsc_create_bidirectional_iter( d, group );
8621
8622 return gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes(d, g, (void*) &parentit,
8623 &paramstore,
8624 gsc_helper_parentchooser_selfing,
8625 gsc_helper_make_offspring_self_n_times );
8626}
8627
8636static void gsc_helper_make_offspring_doubled_haploids(gsc_SimData* d,
8637 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8638 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2],
8639 gsc_GenoLocation putHere) {
8640 gsc_generate_doubled_haploid(d,
8641 gsc_get_alleles(parents[0].loc),
8642 gsc_get_alleles(putHere),
8643 parents[0].mapindex);
8644}
8645
8665gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_doubled_haploids(gsc_SimData* d,
8666 const gsc_GroupNum group,
8667 const gsc_MapID which_map,
8668 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8669 /*int group_size = gsc_get_group_size( d, group);
8670 if (group_size < 1) {
8671 fprintf(stderr,"Group %d does not exist.\n", group.num);
8672 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8673 }*/
8674 if (d->genome.n_maps == 0) {
8675 fprintf(stderr,"Crossing requires at least one recombination map loaded\n");
8676 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8677 }
8678
8679 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes paramstore = { 0 };
8680
8681 if (which_map.id != NO_MAP.id) {
8682 paramstore.doub_haps.map_index = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, which_map);
8683 }
8684 if (paramstore.doub_haps.map_index == GSC_NA_IDX) {
8685 fprintf(stderr,"Could not find recombination map with identifier %lu\n", (long unsigned int) which_map.id);
8686 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8687 }
8688
8689 gsc_BidirectionalIterator parentit = gsc_create_bidirectional_iter( d, group );
8690
8691 return gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes(d, g, (void*) &parentit,
8692 &paramstore,
8693 gsc_helper_parentchooser_selfing,
8694 gsc_helper_make_offspring_doubled_haploids );
8695}
8696
8708static int gsc_helper_parentchooser_cloning(void* parentIterator,
8709 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8710 GSC_GLOBALX_T* counter,
8711 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2]) {
8712 gsc_BidirectionalIterator* it = (gsc_BidirectionalIterator*) parentIterator;
8713
8714 parents[0].loc = gsc_next_forwards(it);
8715 parents[1] = parents[0];
8716
8717 if (GSC_IS_VALID_LOCATION(parents[0].loc)) {
8718 if (datastore->clones.inherit_names) {
8719 datastore->clones.parent_name = gsc_get_name(parents[0].loc);
8720 }
8721 return GSC_TRUE;
8722 } else {
8723 return GSC_FALSE;
8724 }
8725}
8726
8735static void gsc_helper_make_offspring_clones(gsc_SimData* d,
8736 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes* datastore,
8737 gsc_ParentChoice parents[static 2],
8738 gsc_GenoLocation putHere) {
8739 if (datastore->clones.inherit_names && datastore->clones.parent_name != NULL) {
8740 char* tmpname = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(char)*(strlen(datastore->clones.parent_name) + 1),GSC_TRUE);
8741 strcpy(tmpname, datastore->clones.parent_name);
8742 gsc_set_name(putHere,tmpname);
8743 }
8744
8745 gsc_generate_clone(d, gsc_get_alleles(parents[0].loc), gsc_get_alleles(putHere));
8746}
8747
8773gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_clones(gsc_SimData* d,
8774 const gsc_GroupNum group,
8775 const _Bool inherit_names,
8776 gsc_GenOptions g) {
8777 /*int group_size = gsc_get_group_size( d, group);
8778 if (group_size < 1) {
8779 fprintf(stderr,"Group %d does not exist.\n", group.num);
8780 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8781 }*/
8782
8783 union gsc_datastore_make_genotypes paramstore;
8784 paramstore.clones.inherit_names = inherit_names;
8785
8786 gsc_BidirectionalIterator parentit = gsc_create_bidirectional_iter( d, group );
8787
8788 return gsc_scaffold_make_new_genotypes(d, g, (void*) &parentit,
8789 &paramstore,
8790 gsc_helper_parentchooser_cloning,
8791 gsc_helper_make_offspring_clones );
8792}
8793
8794
8811gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_all_unidirectional_crosses(gsc_SimData* d,
8812 const gsc_GroupNum from_group,
8813 const gsc_MapID mapID,
8814 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8815 GSC_GLOBALX_T group_size = gsc_get_group_size( d, from_group );
8816 if (group_size < 2) {
8817 if (group_size == 1) {
8818 fprintf(stderr,"Group %lu does not have enough members to perform crosses\n", (long unsigned int) from_group.num);
8819 } else {
8820 fprintf(stderr,"Group %lu does not exist\n", (long unsigned int) from_group.num);
8821 }
8822 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8823 }
8824 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(group_indexes,GSC_GLOBALX_T,group_size);
8825 gsc_get_group_indexes( d, from_group, group_size, group_indexes );
8826
8827 // number of crosses = number of entries in upper triangle of matrix
8828 // = half of (n entries in matrix - length of diagonal)
8829 // = half of (lmatrix * lmatrix - lmatrix);
8830 GSC_GLOBALX_T n_crosses = group_size * (group_size - 1) / 2; //* g.family_size;
8831
8832 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(combos0,GSC_GLOBALX_T,n_crosses);
8833 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(combos1,GSC_GLOBALX_T,n_crosses);
8834 GSC_GLOBALX_T* combinations[2] = {combos0, combos1};
8835 GSC_GLOBALX_T cross_index = 0;
8836 for (GSC_GLOBALX_T i = 0; i < group_size; ++i) {
8837 for (GSC_GLOBALX_T j = i + 1; j < group_size; ++j) {
8838 combinations[0][cross_index] = group_indexes[i];
8839 combinations[1][cross_index] = group_indexes[j];
8840
8841 ++cross_index;
8842 }
8843 }
8844
8845 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(group_indexes);
8846 gsc_GroupNum out = gsc_make_targeted_crosses(d, n_crosses, combinations[0], combinations[1], mapID, mapID, g);
8847 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(combos0);
8848 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(combos1);
8849 return out;
8850}
8851
8852gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_n_crosses_from_top_m_percent(gsc_SimData* d, const int n, const int m, const gsc_GroupNum group,
8853 const gsc_MapID mapID, const gsc_EffectID effID, const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8854 fprintf(stderr, "Function gsc_make_n_crosses_from_top_m_percent is deprecated."
8855 "It behaved unintuitively and goes against genomicSimulation principles on division of functionality\n");
8856
8857 return NO_GROUP;
8858}
8859
8886gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_crosses_from_file(gsc_SimData* d,
8887 const char* input_file,
8888 const gsc_MapID map1,
8889 const gsc_MapID map2,
8890 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8891 struct gsc_TableSize t = gsc_get_file_dimensions(input_file, '\t');
8892 if (t.num_rows < 1) {
8893 fprintf(stderr, "No crosses exist in that file\n");
8894 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8895 }
8896
8897 //open file
8898 FILE* fp;
8899 if ((fp = fopen(input_file, "r")) == NULL) {
8900 fprintf(stderr, "Failed to open file %s.\n", input_file); exit(1);
8901 }
8902
8903 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(combos0,GSC_GLOBALX_T,t.num_rows);
8904 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(combos1,GSC_GLOBALX_T,t.num_rows);
8905 GSC_GLOBALX_T* combinations[2] = {combos0,combos1};
8906 char buffer[2][NAME_LENGTH];
8907 // for each row in file
8908 GSC_GLOBALX_T bufferi = 0;
8909 for (int filei = 0; filei < t.num_rows; ++filei) {
8910 // load the four grandparents
8911 fscanf(fp, "%s %s \n", buffer[0], buffer[1]);
8912 combinations[0][bufferi] = gsc_get_index_of_name(d->m, buffer[0]);
8913 combinations[1][bufferi] = gsc_get_index_of_name(d->m, buffer[1]);
8914 if (combinations[0][bufferi] < 0 || combinations[1][bufferi] < 0) {
8915 fprintf(stderr, "Parents on file %s line %lu could not be found\n", input_file, (long unsigned int) filei);
8916 } else {
8917 ++bufferi;
8918 }
8919 }
8920
8921 fclose(fp);
8922 gsc_GroupNum out = gsc_make_targeted_crosses(d, bufferi, combinations[0], combinations[1], map1, map2, g);
8923 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(combos0);
8924 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(combos1);
8925 return out;
8926}
8927
8960gsc_GroupNum gsc_make_double_crosses_from_file(gsc_SimData* d,
8961 const char* input_file,
8962 const gsc_MapID map1,
8963 const gsc_MapID map2,
8964 const gsc_GenOptions g) {
8965 struct gsc_TableSize t = gsc_get_file_dimensions(input_file, '\t');
8966 if (t.num_rows < 1) {
8967 fprintf(stderr, "No crosses exist in that file\n");
8968 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
8969 }
8970
8971 //open file
8972 FILE* fp;
8973 if ((fp = fopen(input_file, "r")) == NULL) {
8974 fprintf(stderr, "Failed to open file %s.\n", input_file); exit(1);
8975 }
8976
8977 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(combos0,GSC_GLOBALX_T,t.num_rows);
8978 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(combos1,GSC_GLOBALX_T,t.num_rows);
8979 GSC_GLOBALX_T* combinations[2] = {combos0,combos1};
8980 char buffer[4][NAME_LENGTH];
8981 const char* to_buffer[] = {buffer[0], buffer[1], buffer[2], buffer[3]};
8982 gsc_PedigreeID g0_id[4];
8983 GSC_GLOBALX_T f1_i[2];
8984 // for each row in file
8985 for (GSC_GLOBALX_T i = 0; i < t.num_rows; ++i) {
8986 // load the four grandparents
8987 fscanf(fp, "%s %s %s %s \n", buffer[0], buffer[1], buffer[2], buffer[3]);
8988 gsc_get_ids_of_names(d->m, 4, to_buffer, g0_id);
8989 if (g0_id[0].id == GSC_NO_PEDIGREE.id || g0_id[1].id == GSC_NO_PEDIGREE.id || g0_id[2].id == GSC_NO_PEDIGREE.id || g0_id[3].id == GSC_NO_PEDIGREE.id) {
8990 fprintf(stderr, "Could not go ahead with the line %lu cross - g0 names not in records\n",
8991 (long unsigned int) i);
8992 combinations[0][i] = GSC_NA_GLOBALX;
8993 combinations[1][i] = GSC_NA_GLOBALX;
8994 continue;
8995 }
8996
8997 // identify two parents
8998 f1_i[0] = gsc_get_index_of_child(d->m, g0_id[0], g0_id[1]);
8999 f1_i[1] = gsc_get_index_of_child(d->m, g0_id[2], g0_id[3]);
9000 if (f1_i[0] < 0 || f1_i[1] < 0) {
9001 // try different permutations of the four grandparents.
9002 f1_i[0] = gsc_get_index_of_child(d->m, g0_id[0], g0_id[2]);
9003 f1_i[1] = gsc_get_index_of_child(d->m, g0_id[1], g0_id[3]);
9004 if (f1_i[0] < 0 || f1_i[1] < 0) {
9005 f1_i[0] = gsc_get_index_of_child(d->m, g0_id[0], g0_id[3]);
9006 f1_i[1] = gsc_get_index_of_child(d->m, g0_id[1], g0_id[2]);
9007 if (f1_i[0] < 0 || f1_i[1] < 0) {
9008 fprintf(stderr, "Could not go ahead with the line %lu cross - f1 children do not exist for this quartet\n",
9009 (long unsigned int) i);
9010 combinations[0][i] = GSC_NA_GLOBALX;
9011 combinations[1][i] = GSC_NA_GLOBALX;
9012 continue;
9013 }
9014 }
9015 }
9016
9017 //add them to a combinations list
9018 combinations[0][i] = f1_i[0];
9019 combinations[1][i] = f1_i[1];
9020
9021 }
9022
9023 fclose(fp);
9024 gsc_GroupNum out = gsc_make_targeted_crosses(d, t.num_rows, combinations[0], combinations[1],
9025 map1, map2, g);
9026 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(combos0);
9027 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(combos1);
9028 return out;
9029}
9030
9031
9032/*--------------------------------Fitness------------------------------------*/
9033
9048gsc_GroupNum gsc_split_by_bv(gsc_SimData* d,
9049 const gsc_GroupNum group,
9050 const gsc_EffectID effID,
9051 const GSC_GLOBALX_T top_n,
9052 const _Bool lowIsBest) {
9053 const GSC_ID_T effIndex = gsc_get_index_of_eff_set(d, effID);
9054 if (effIndex == GSC_NA_IDX || d->e[effIndex].effects.rows < 1 || d->m == NULL) {
9055 fprintf(stderr, "Either effect matrix or allele matrix does not exist\n");
9056 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
9057 }
9058
9059 GSC_GLOBALX_T group_size = gsc_get_group_size( d, group );
9060 if (group_size == 0) {
9061 fprintf(stderr,"Group %lu does not exist\n", (long unsigned int) group.num);
9062 return GSC_NO_GROUP;
9063 }
9064 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(group_indexes,GSC_GLOBALX_T,group_size);
9065 gsc_get_group_indexes( d, group, group_size, group_indexes );
9066
9067 if (group_size <= top_n) {
9068 // well we'll just have to move em all
9069 gsc_GroupNum migration = gsc_make_group_from(d, group_size, group_indexes);
9070 return migration;
9071 }
9072
9073 // This should be ordered the same as the indexes
9074 gsc_DecimalMatrix fits = gsc_calculate_bvs( d, group, effID ); // 1 by group_size matrix
9075
9076 // get an array of pointers to those fitnesses
9077 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(p_fits,double*,fits.cols);
9078 for (size_t i = 0; i < fits.cols; i++) {
9079 p_fits[i] = &(fits.matrix[0][i]);
9080 }
9081
9082 // sort descending
9083 if (lowIsBest) {
9084 qsort(p_fits, fits.cols, sizeof(double*), gsc_helper_ascending_pdouble_comparer);
9085 } else {
9086 qsort(p_fits, fits.cols, sizeof(double*), gsc_helper_descending_pdouble_comparer);
9087 }
9088
9089 // save the indexes of the best n
9090 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(top_individuals,GSC_GLOBALX_T,top_n);
9091 for (GSC_GLOBALX_T i = 0; i < top_n; i++) {
9092 top_individuals[i] = group_indexes[p_fits[i] - fits.matrix[0]];
9093 }
9094 gsc_delete_dmatrix(&fits);
9095 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(p_fits);
9096 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(group_indexes);
9097
9098 // send those n to a new group
9099 gsc_GroupNum out = gsc_make_group_from(d, top_n, top_individuals);
9100 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(top_individuals);
9101 return out;
9102}
9103
9121gsc_DecimalMatrix gsc_calculate_bvs(const gsc_SimData* d,
9122 const gsc_GroupNum group,
9123 const gsc_EffectID effID) {
9124 const GSC_ID_T effIndex = gsc_get_index_of_eff_set(d, effID);
9125 if (effIndex == GSC_NA_IDX || d->e[effIndex].effects.rows < 1 || d->m == NULL) {
9126 fprintf(stderr, "Effect matrix does not exist\n");
9127 return gsc_generate_zero_dmatrix(0, 0);
9128 }
9129 gsc_EffectMatrix e = d->e[effIndex];
9130
9131 // casing away const but I promise not to use the iterator to change anything
9132 gsc_BidirectionalIterator it = gsc_create_bidirectional_iter((gsc_SimData*) d, group);
9133
9134 gsc_DecimalMatrix bvs = gsc_calculate_utility_bvs(&it, &e);
9135
9136 gsc_delete_bidirectional_iter(&it);
9137 return bvs;
9138}
9139
9151gsc_DecimalMatrix gsc_calculate_utility_bvs(gsc_BidirectionalIterator* targets,
9152 const gsc_EffectMatrix* effset) {
9153 if (targets == NULL || effset == NULL) {
9154 fprintf(stderr, "Either targets or marker effects were not provided\n");
9155 return gsc_generate_zero_dmatrix(0, 0);
9156 }
9157
9158 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(genotypes, char*, 50);
9159 GSC_GLOBALX_T n_genotypes = 0;
9160 gsc_GenoLocation loc = gsc_set_bidirectional_iter_to_start(targets);
9161 while (IS_VALID_LOCATION(loc)) {
9162 if (n_genotypes >= genotypescap) {
9163 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(genotypes, 2*n_genotypes);
9164 }
9165 genotypes[n_genotypes] = gsc_get_alleles(loc);
9166 ++n_genotypes;
9167
9168 loc = gsc_next_forwards(targets);
9169 }
9170
9171 GSC_GENOLEN_T n_markers = effset->effects.cols;
9172 gsc_DecimalMatrix sum = gsc_generate_zero_dmatrix(1, n_genotypes);
9173 gsc_DecimalMatrix counts = gsc_generate_zero_dmatrix(n_genotypes, n_markers );
9174 gsc_DecimalMatrix counts2 = gsc_generate_zero_dmatrix(n_genotypes, n_markers );
9175
9176 GSC_GENOLEN_T i = 0; // highest allele index
9177
9178 for (; i < effset->effects.rows - 1; i += 2) {
9179 // get the allele counts in counts
9180 gsc_calculate_utility_allele_counts_pair(n_markers, n_genotypes, (const char**) genotypes,
9181 effset->effect_names[i], &counts, effset->effect_names[i+1], &counts2);
9182
9183 // multiply counts with effects and add to bv sum
9184 gsc_add_doublematrixvector_product_to_dmatrix(&sum, &counts, effset->effects.matrix[i],
9185 &counts2, effset->effects.matrix[i+1]);
9186 }
9187 if (i < effset->effects.rows) { // deal with the last odd-numbered allele
9188 gsc_calculate_utility_allele_counts(n_markers, n_genotypes, (const char**) genotypes,
9189 effset->effect_names[i], &counts);
9190 gsc_add_matrixvector_product_to_dmatrix(&sum, &counts, effset->effects.matrix[i]);
9191 }
9192
9193 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(genotypes);
9194 gsc_delete_dmatrix(&counts);
9195 gsc_delete_dmatrix(&counts2);
9196
9197 return sum;
9198}
9199
9216gsc_DecimalMatrix gsc_calculate_allele_counts(const gsc_SimData* d,
9217 const gsc_GroupNum group,
9218 const char allele) {
9219 // To upgrade this to use iterators instead, we'll need some modifications to DecimalMatrix. Future work.
9220 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(genotypes, char*, 50);
9221 GSC_GLOBALX_T n_genotypes = 0;
9222 // casing away const but I promise not to use the iterator to change anything
9223 gsc_BidirectionalIterator it = gsc_create_bidirectional_iter((gsc_SimData*) d, group);
9224
9225 gsc_GenoLocation loc = gsc_set_bidirectional_iter_to_start(&it);
9226 while (IS_VALID_LOCATION(loc)) {
9227 if (n_genotypes >= genotypescap) {
9228 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(genotypes, 2*n_genotypes);
9229 }
9230 genotypes[n_genotypes] = gsc_get_alleles(loc);
9231 ++n_genotypes;
9232
9233 loc = gsc_next_forwards(&it);
9234 }
9235 gsc_delete_bidirectional_iter(&it);
9236
9237 GSC_GENOLEN_T n_markers = d->m->n_markers;
9238 gsc_DecimalMatrix counts = gsc_generate_zero_dmatrix(n_genotypes, n_markers );
9239
9240 gsc_calculate_utility_allele_counts(n_markers, n_genotypes, (const char** const) genotypes,
9241 allele, &counts);
9242
9243 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(genotypes);
9244 return counts;
9245}
9246
9260void gsc_calculate_utility_allele_counts(const GSC_GENOLEN_T n_markers,
9261 const GSC_GLOBALX_T n_genotypes,
9262 const char** const genotypes,
9263 const char allele,
9264 gsc_DecimalMatrix* counts) {
9265 if (genotypes == NULL || counts == NULL ||
9266 counts->rows < n_genotypes ||
9267 counts->cols < n_markers) {
9268 fprintf(stderr, "Inputs for calculating count matrix are improperly sized: calculation cannot proceed\n"); return;
9269 }
9270
9271 for (GSC_GLOBALX_T i = 0; i < n_genotypes; ++i) {
9272 //RPACKINSERT R_CheckUserInterrupt();
9273 if (genotypes[i] == NULL) {
9274 continue;
9275 }
9276
9277 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T j = 0; j < n_markers; ++j) {
9278 int cell_sum = 0;
9279 if (genotypes[i][2*j] == allele) { ++cell_sum; }
9280 if (genotypes[i][2*j + 1] == allele) { ++cell_sum; }
9281 counts->matrix[i][j] = cell_sum;
9282 }
9283 }
9284}
9285
9308void gsc_calculate_utility_allele_counts_pair(const GSC_GENOLEN_T n_markers,
9309 const GSC_GLOBALX_T n_genotypes,
9310 const char** const genotypes,
9311 const char allele,
9312 gsc_DecimalMatrix* counts,
9313 const char allele2,
9314 gsc_DecimalMatrix* counts2) {
9315 if (genotypes == NULL || counts == NULL || counts2 == NULL ||
9316 counts->rows < n_genotypes || counts2->rows < n_genotypes ||
9317 counts->cols < n_markers || counts2->cols < n_markers) {
9318 fprintf(stderr, "Inputs for calculating count matrix are improperly sized: calculation cannot proceed\n"); return;
9319 }
9320
9321 for (GSC_GLOBALX_T i = 0; i < n_genotypes; ++i) {
9322 //RPACKINSERT R_CheckUserInterrupt();
9323 if (genotypes[i] == NULL) {
9324 continue;
9325 }
9326
9327 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T j = 0; j < n_markers; ++j) {
9328 int cell_sum = 0;
9329 int cell_sum2 = 0;
9330 if (genotypes[i][2*j] == allele) { ++cell_sum; }
9331 else if (genotypes[i][2*j] == allele2) { ++cell_sum2;}
9332 if (genotypes[i][2*j + 1] == allele) { ++cell_sum; }
9333 else if (genotypes[i][2*j + 1] == allele2) { ++cell_sum2;}
9334 counts->matrix[i][j] = cell_sum;
9335 counts2->matrix[i][j] = cell_sum2;
9336 }
9337 }
9338}
9339
9340
9368gsc_MarkerBlocks gsc_create_evenlength_blocks_each_chr(const gsc_SimData* d,
9369 const gsc_MapID mapid,
9370 const GSC_ID_T n) {
9371 gsc_MarkerBlocks blocks;
9372 blocks.num_blocks = 0;
9373
9374 if (d->genome.n_maps < 1) {
9375 fprintf(stderr,"Creating blocks by chromosome length requires at least one recombination map loaded\n");
9376 return blocks;
9377 }
9378 GSC_ID_T mapix = 0;
9379 if (mapid.id != NO_MAP.id) { mapix = gsc_get_index_of_map(d, mapid); }
9380 if (mapix >= d->genome.n_maps) {
9381 fprintf(stderr,"We don't have that recombination maps loaded. Using default map\n");
9382 mapix = 0;
9383 }
9384 gsc_RecombinationMap map = d->genome.maps[mapix];
9385
9386 if (n < 1) {
9387 fprintf(stderr,"Invalid n value: number of blocks must be positive\n");
9388 return blocks;
9389 }
9390 if (map.n_chr < 1) {
9391 fprintf(stderr,"Map has no chromosomes, so it cannot be divided into blocks\n");
9392 }
9393
9394 blocks.num_blocks = n * map.n_chr;
9395 blocks.num_markers_in_block = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*blocks.num_markers_in_block) * blocks.num_blocks,GSC_TRUE);
9396 blocks.markers_in_block = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*blocks.markers_in_block) * blocks.num_blocks,GSC_TRUE);
9397 for (GSC_ID_T i = 0; i < blocks.num_blocks; ++i) {
9398 blocks.num_markers_in_block[i] = 0;
9399 blocks.markers_in_block[i] = NULL;
9400 }
9401
9402 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(temp_markers_in_block, GSC_GENOLEN_T, 128);
9403 GSC_GENOLEN_T bi = 0;
9404
9405 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T chr = 0; chr < map.n_chr; ++chr) {
9406 size_t current_block_filling = 0; //counter of how many blocks we have in this chr so far
9407 double chrpos = 0;
9408 bi = 0;
9409
9410 // loop through each marker in this chromosome
9411 switch (map.chrs[chr].type) {
9412 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_SIMPLE:
9413 if (map.chrs[chr].map.simple.n_markers == 1) {
9414 GSC_ID_T b = chr*n + 0;
9415 blocks.markers_in_block[b] = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*blocks.markers_in_block[b]), GSC_TRUE);
9416 blocks.markers_in_block[b][0] = map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index;
9417 ++(blocks.num_markers_in_block[b]);
9418 } else {
9419 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T i = 0; i < map.chrs[chr].map.simple.n_markers; ++i) {
9420 //RPACKINSERT R_CheckUserInterrupt();
9421 chrpos += map.chrs[chr].map.simple.dists[i];
9422 while (current_block_filling < n - 1 && chrpos > current_block_filling / n) {
9423 GSC_ID_T b = chr*n + current_block_filling;
9424 if (blocks.num_markers_in_block[b] > 0) {
9425 GSC_GENOLEN_T bcapacity = sizeof(*blocks.markers_in_block[b])*blocks.num_markers_in_block[b];
9426 blocks.markers_in_block[b] = gsc_malloc_wrap(bcapacity, GSC_TRUE);
9427 memcpy(blocks.markers_in_block[b],temp_markers_in_block,bcapacity);
9428 }
9429
9430 ++current_block_filling;
9431 bi = 0;
9432 }
9433
9434 // save marker
9435 if (bi >= temp_markers_in_blockcap) {
9436 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(temp_markers_in_block,2*bi);
9437 }
9438 temp_markers_in_block[bi] = map.chrs[chr].map.simple.first_marker_index + i;
9439 ++(blocks.num_markers_in_block[chr*n + current_block_filling]);
9440 ++bi;
9441
9442 }
9443
9444 GSC_ID_T b = chr*n + current_block_filling;
9445 if (blocks.num_markers_in_block[b] > 0) {
9446 GSC_GENOLEN_T bcapacity = sizeof(*blocks.markers_in_block[b])*blocks.num_markers_in_block[b];
9447 blocks.markers_in_block[b] = gsc_malloc_wrap(bcapacity, GSC_TRUE);
9448 memcpy(blocks.markers_in_block[b],temp_markers_in_block,bcapacity);
9449 }
9450 }
9451 break;
9452
9453 case GSC_LINKAGEGROUP_REORDER:
9454 if (map.chrs[chr].map.simple.n_markers == 1) {
9455 GSC_ID_T b = chr*n + 0;
9456 blocks.markers_in_block[b] = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(*blocks.markers_in_block[b]), GSC_TRUE);
9457 blocks.markers_in_block[b][0] = map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[0];
9458 ++(blocks.num_markers_in_block[b]);
9459 } else {
9460 for (GSC_GENOLEN_T i = 0; i < map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.n_markers; ++i) {
9461 //RPACKINSERT R_CheckUserInterrupt();
9462 chrpos += map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.dists[i];
9463 while (current_block_filling < n - 1 && chrpos > current_block_filling / n) {
9464 GSC_ID_T b = chr*n + current_block_filling;
9465 if (blocks.num_markers_in_block[b] > 0) {
9466 GSC_GENOLEN_T bcapacity = sizeof(*blocks.markers_in_block[b])*blocks.num_markers_in_block[b];
9467 blocks.markers_in_block[b] = gsc_malloc_wrap(bcapacity, GSC_TRUE);
9468 memcpy(blocks.markers_in_block[b],temp_markers_in_block,bcapacity);
9469 }
9470
9471 ++current_block_filling;
9472 bi = 0;
9473 }
9474
9475 // save marker
9476 if (bi >= temp_markers_in_blockcap) {
9477 GSC_STRETCH_BUFFER(temp_markers_in_block,2*bi);
9478 }
9479 temp_markers_in_block[bi] = map.chrs[chr].map.reorder.marker_indexes[i];
9480 ++(blocks.num_markers_in_block[chr*n + current_block_filling]);
9481 ++bi;
9482
9483 }
9484
9485 GSC_ID_T b = chr*n + current_block_filling;
9486 if (blocks.num_markers_in_block[b] > 0) {
9487 GSC_GENOLEN_T bcapacity = sizeof(*blocks.markers_in_block[b])*blocks.num_markers_in_block[b];
9488 blocks.markers_in_block[b] = gsc_malloc_wrap(bcapacity, GSC_TRUE);
9489 memcpy(blocks.markers_in_block[b],temp_markers_in_block,bcapacity);
9490 }
9491 }
9492 break;
9493 }
9494
9495 }
9496
9497 GSC_DELETE_BUFFER(temp_markers_in_block);
9498
9499 return blocks;
9500}
9501
9523gsc_MarkerBlocks gsc_load_blocks(const gsc_SimData* d, const char* block_file) {
9524 struct gsc_TableSize ts = gsc_get_file_dimensions(block_file, '\t');
9525
9526 gsc_MarkerBlocks blocks;
9527 blocks.num_blocks = ts.num_rows - 1;
9528 blocks.num_markers_in_block = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(GSC_GENOLEN_T) * blocks.num_blocks,GSC_TRUE);
9529 blocks.markers_in_block = gsc_malloc_wrap(sizeof(GSC_GENOLEN_T*) * blocks.num_blocks,GSC_TRUE);
9530
9531 FILE* infile;
9532 if ((infile = fopen(block_file, "r")) == NULL) {
9533 fprintf(stderr, "Failed to open file %s.\n", block_file); exit(1);
9534 //return blocks;
9535 }
9536
9537 GSC_GENOLEN_T bufferlen = d->genome.n_markers;
9538 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(markername,char,CONTIG_WIDTH);
9539 GSC_CREATE_BUFFER(markerbuffer,GSC_GENOLEN_T,bufferlen);
9540 GSC_ID_T bi = 0; // block number
9541
9542 // Ignore the first line
9543 fscanf(infile, "%*[^\n]\n");
9544
9545 // Loop through rows of the file (each row corresponds to a block)
9546 while (fscanf(infile, "%*d %*f %*s %*s ") != EOF) {
9547 //for (int bi = 0; bi < n_blocks; ++bi) {
9548
9549 // Indexes in play:
9550 // bi: index in the blocks struct's arrays of the current block/line in the file
9551 // ni: number of characters so far in the name of the next marker being read from the file
9552 // mi: number of markers that have so far been read from the file for this block
9553 blocks.num_markers_in_block[bi] = 0;
9554 int c;
9555 size_t ni = 0;
9556 GSC_GENOLEN_T mi = 0;
9557
9558 memset(markerbuffer, 0, sizeof(*markerbuffer) * bufferlen);
9559 while ((c = fgetc(infile)) != EOF && c !='\n') {
9560 if (c == ';') {
9561 markername[ni] = '\0';
9562
